input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specifications below. You are an amazing copywriter so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
FouFou Dog Rubber Dipped Socks

Item specifications:
Perfect for indoor or outdoor use
Protects paws from elements such as water, snow, dirt, salt, and hot pavements
Detachable hook and loop closure strap
Rubber dipped

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Our FouFou Dog Rubber Dipped Socks feature a rubber-dipped design that will protect your furry friend's paws from harsh elements such as water, snow, dirt, salt, and hot pavements. The detachable hook and loop closure strap ensures a secure and comfortable fit. These socks are perfect for indoor or outdoor use and will keep your furry friend's feet safe and dry.
input_text.Response B: The iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets are designed to be used at shooting ranges. They are made in the USA and come in a 13x19 size. These targets are made of thick paper and feature the iCandy Combat design. They are perfect for adults and children who enjoy target shooting!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
